snippet.title: Fortnite Chapter 4 Season 1 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season 1. www.fortnite.com

Explore the new Island, get around with the Dirt Bike, use newly forged weapons like the Shockwave Hammer and Ex-Caliber Rifle, discover Augments, and so much more

New Locations:

The Citadel

This point of interest is the castle of The Ageless, whose duty protects Reality.

Shattered Slabs

The Quarry is the site of a large Kinetic Ore mining operation. Use Kinetic Ore for physics sorcery:

Brutal Bastion

This headquarters of the Reality Warriors is located atop a snowy mountain. Speaking of snow, hit snow with your Pickaxe to create a snowball, jump inside the snowball, then get rolling. You can attack enemies this way too…

Slappy Shores

The Industrial Town is most known as the location of the “Slap Juice” factory. 

In addition to new locations to explore, discover new ways to get around.

Steer Your Dirt Bike Steed

One of the many ways to get to these places? The trusty, two-wheel Trail Thrasher. Pull off tricks on this dirt bike and use weapons as you ride.

Switch up your playstyle with Augments.

At intervals in your match, you’ll be given a randomized choice of “Reality Augments.” The longer you remain in the match, the more Reality Augments you’ll have stacked. Your Reality Augments last until the end of the match.

Jump into Chapter 4 now!

#Fortnite #Chapter4 #FortniteChapter4
